amendment.description: An amendment No. 56 printed in House Report 113-170 to prevent any funds from being used to rebase any Air Force, Air Guard, or Air Force Reserve aircraft until 60 days after the National Commission on the Structure of the Air Force has submitted its report as required by the FY 2013 NDAA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palazzo amendment (A050) Failed by voice vote.
